sentence: Customer service food scenery and everything else about the Four Seasons Punta Mita were world class
Excellent property excellent service excellent acomodations
This resort was outstanding from the service to the amazing view from our room overlooking the ocean
Lovely staff location and beach
The hotel and staff were both amazing
Hugo Guerero Hugo is super friendly and provides excellent service

After a private transfer from Puerto Valarta Airport to the hotel we were greeted by the polite staff who seated us offered cool moist scented towels to wipe our hands and faces then a fruit drink with tequila while they ran our credit card
Pretty amazing customer service to remember who we were and find us at a completely different location at the resort
Staff was great walking around the resort was great but no wow
Service at all restaurants and bars was friendly and attentive
The gym has lots of equipment and staffed during the day
The hotel was also kept relatively bug free bug spray was provided to each guest and staff would spray special sprays however every other family member besides me got bit
There is an extensive room service menu as well
What ever you need the staff will address with options and you will not need to lift a finger
Every single staff member
However we are finding a gap in the attentiveness of staff members
Nobody came over once in 40 minutes to ask if I needed a drink while at the beach — despite my having the service sign correctly displayed
Came back for July 4th and was very disapointed with the quality of service

We also enjoyed the activities by the beach I have just one minor suggestion for the staff there to offer help when they see a mom with 2 small kids 3 and 4 trying to carry a buggy board snorkeling gear fins and life vests to the beach The food is quite pricy considering it is in Mexico but probably not outrageous for US standards
This was awesome in theory but did not quite work out as one day we came back to our room at 5 pm and the room still had not been serviced the first time
The staff are friendly not pushy or overly observant
